questions.question: You are given a task and the manager asks you to check with your team member if you can take over the task. What will you do?
options: Ask the team member if they are comfortable with you taking over the task.
Immediately take over the task without asking the team member.
Ask your manager to assign the task to someone else.
Ask your manager to ask your team member to take over the task.
questions.correct_answer: Ask the team member if they are comfortable with you taking over the task.

questions.question: Your manager asks you to complete a task that you have never done before. What will you do?
options: Ask your manager to assign the task to someone else who knows how to do it.
Ask your manager to teach you how to do the task.
Google how to do the task and try to complete it.
Ask your team members if they know how to do the task.
questions.correct_answer: Ask your manager to teach you how to do the task.

questions.question: You are given a task that you need to complete in 2 hours. You have already completed 50% of the task in 1 hour. How will you manage your time to complete the remaining 50% of the task?
questions.category: Handling multitasking and managing multiple assignments
options: Complete the task in the next 1 hour.
Take a break for 1 hour and then complete the task in the next 1 hour.
Complete the task in the next 2 hours.
Complete the task in the next 3 hours.
questions.correct_answer: Complete the task in the next 1 hour.

questions.question: You are given a project that requires you to manage multiple tasks and meet a deadline. What will you do?
options: Create a project plan and stick to it.
Create a project plan but don't stick to it.
Don't create a project plan.
Create a project plan and then ask your manager to help you with it.
questions.correct_answer: Create a project plan and stick to it.

questions.question: You are in a job interview and the interviewer asks you to describe a time when you had to deal with a difficult customer. What will you say?
options: I will describe a time when I had to deal with a difficult customer and how I handled the situation professionally.
I will describe a time when I had to deal with a difficult customer and how I lost my temper.
I will describe a time when I had to deal with a difficult customer and how I complained to my manager.
I will describe a time when I had to deal with a difficult customer and how I asked my manager to help me.
questions.correct_answer: I will describe a time when I had to deal with a difficult customer and how I handled the situation professionally.

questions.question: You are in a job interview and the interviewer asks you to describe a time when you had to work on a team project. What will you say?
options: I will describe a time when I had to work on a team project and how I contributed to the team.
I will describe a time when I had to work on a team project and how I did not contribute to the team.
I will describe a time when I had to work on a team project and how I complained about the team.
I will describe a time when I had to work on a team project and how I asked my manager to help me.
questions.correct_answer: I will describe a time when I had to work on a team project and how I contributed to the team.
